Mohammed Salah scored a hat-trick, leading Egypt to a resounding victory over Ghana in the high-stakes World Cup qualifier, making him a national hero overnight.
Egypt and Ghana faced each other in a thrilling match that had fans on the edge of their seats from start to finish, with moments of sheer brilliance from both sides.
Egypt's historic win against Ghana left fans ecstatic and solidified their place in the World Cup lineup, showcasing their dominance on the international soccer stage.
